title: updating kubernetes to http2, seeing "bogus greeting"
body:
xref: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/25280#issuecomment-221122991

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
go1.6.2 

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
GOARCH="amd64"
GOBIN=""
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="linux"
GOOS="linux"
GOPATH=""
GORACE=""
GOROOT="/usr/lib/golang"
GOTOOLDIR="/usr/lib/golang/pkg/tool/linux_amd64"
GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT="1"
CC="gcc"
GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -pthread -fmessage-length=0"
CXX="g++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"

3. What did you do?
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/25280/commits
Update k8s to use http2 caused test failure in that project which on inspection shows 

4. What did you expect to see?
No errors. 

5. What did you see instead?
```http2: server: error reading preface from client 192.3.0.114:39912: bogus greeting "POST /attach/default/e2e"```
